text:
When connecting Tomcat to Apache using mod_jk, it should modify mod_jk.conf-
auto according to mod_jk.conf to use jpr13 instead of jpr12. but it does not.

I had to modify  ***org.apache.tomcat.task.ApacheConfig.java*** inside 
***webserver.jar*** to generate tomcat to work with jpr13, but it should read 
it from else were and not in hard code.
creator: noam@com-sense.com
marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text: Won't be addressed for Tomcat 3.2.2 but will be considered for a later release.
